Name: Shamrock
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
7.5 ml Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Fragata Green Olive in the glass or mint leaf.
Review: A cocktail best enjoyed as an after-dinner refresher on St. Patrick's Day .
History: Adapted from a recipe in Hugo R. Ensslin's 1917 Recipes for Mixed Drinks (2nd Edition) .
Nutrition: One serving of Shamrock contains 199 calories
